page.title: 10RELIGION
page.content: {St. Lukes Church Holton le moor is part of the South Kelsey group of churches.The vicar in charge of it is Rev.Frank Rogers who lives at South Kelsey.There are two services held regularly each month and occasionly there are special family services.There is no regular choir but two local children act as selver and cross bearer.There are two church wardens who are chosen annually by the Parochial Church Council.There are fifty names on the Electoral Roll and all are eligible for the P.C.C. A register is kept of all baptisms, weddings and funerals and up to July there had been one wedding and one funeral in 1985. A harvest supper is held most years at the end of September .A Mothering Sunday service is usually held,& the children play a large part in it.
